sections.text: anuvAkaM - 1

sahaq vai dEqvAnAqM cAsu#rANAM ca yaqj~jau prata#tAvAstAM ~Mvaqya(gg) svaqrgaM ~MlOqkamE$ShyAmO vaqyamE$ShyAmaq itiq tE&su#rAH saqnnahyaq saha#saiqvAca#ran brahmaqcaryE#Naq tapa#saiva dEqvAstE&su#rA amuhyaq(gg)qstE na prAjA#naq(gg)qstE parA#BavaqntE na svaqrgaM ~MlOqkamA#yaqn, prasRu#tEnaq vai yaqj~jEna# dEqvAH svaqrgaM ~MlOqkamA#yaqn na prasRu#tEqnAsu#rAqn parA#&BAvayaqn ,prasRu#tO haq vai ya#j~jOpavIqtinO# yaqj~jO&pra#sRuqtO&nu#pavIqtinOq yatki~jca# brAhmaqNO ya#j~jOpavIqtyadhI#tEq yaja#ta Eqva tat tasmA$d yaj~jOpavIqtyE#vAdhI#yIta yAqjayEqd yajE#ta vA yaqj~jasyaq prasRu#tyAq , aji#naqM ~MvAsO# vA dakShiNaqta u#paqvIyaq dakShi#NaM bAqhumuddha#raqtE&va# dhattE saqvyamiti# yaj~jOpavIqtamEqtadEqva vipa#rItaM prAcInAvIqta(gm) saqm~MvIta#M mAnuqSham || 1 (1)
anuvAkaM - 2

rakShA(gm)#siq havA# purOnuvAqkE tapO&gra#matiShThantaq tAn praqjApa#tir vaqrENOqpAma#ntrayataq tAniq vara#mavRuNItAdiqtyO nOq yOddhAq itiq tAn praqjApa#ti-rabravIqd-yOdha#yaqddhvamitiq tasmAqdutti#ShThantaq(gm)q havAq tAniq rakShA(gg)#syAdiqtyaM ~MyOdha#yantiq yAva#dastaqmanva#gAqt tAni# haq vA EqtAniq rakShA(gm)#si gAyatriqyA &Bi#mantritEqnAMBa#sA SAmyantiq tadu# haq vA EqtE bra#hmavAqdina#H pUqrvABi#muqKAH saqndhyAyA$M gAyatriqyA&Bi#mantritAq Apa# UqrddhvaM ~MvikShi#pantiq tA EqtA ApO# vaqjrIBUqtvA tAniq rakShA(gm)#si maqndEhA&ru#NE dvIqpE prakShi#pantiq yat pra#dakShiqNaM prakra#mantiq tEna# pAqpmAnaqmava# dhUnvantyuqdyanta#mastaqM ~Myanta#mAdiqtya-ma#BiddhyAqyan kuqrvan brA$hmaqNO viqdvAnth saqkala#M Baqdrama#SnutEq &sAvA#diqtyO braqhmEtiq brahmaiqva san brahmAqpyEtiq ya EqvaM ~MvEda# || 2 (1)
anuvAkaM - 3

yad-dE#vA dEvaqhEDa#naqM (dEvaqhELa#naqM) dEvA#saScakRuqmA vaqyam | Adi#tyAqstasmA$nmA mu~jcataqrtasyaqrtEnaq mAmiqta || dEvA# jIvanakAqmyA yad-vAqcA&nRu#tamUdiqma | tasmA$nna iqha mu#~jcataq viSvE# dEvAH saqjOSha#saH || RuqtEna# dyAvApRuthivI RuqtEnaq tva(gm) sa#rasvati | kRuqtAnna#H pAqhyEna#sOq yat ki~jcAnRu#tamUdiqma || iqndrAqgnI miqtrAvaru#Nauq sOmO# dhAqtA bRuhaqspati#H | tE nO# mu~jcaqntvEna#sOq yadaqnyakRu#tamAriqma || saqjAqtaqSaq(gm)qsAduqta jA#miSaq(gm)q sAjjyAya#saqH Sa(gm)sA#duqta vAq kanI#yasaH | anA#dhRuShTaM dEqvakRu#taqM ~MyadEnaqstasmAqt tvamaqsmA~j jA#tavEdO mumugdhi ( ) || yadvAqcA yan mana#sA bAqhuByA#-mUqruByA#maShThIqvadByA# SiqSnairyadanRu#taM cakRuqmA vaqyam | aqgnirmAq tasmAqdEna#sAq gAr.ha#patyaqH pramu#~jcatu cakRuqma yAni# duShkRuqtA || yEna# triqtO a#rNaqvAn ni#rbaqBUvaq yEnaq sUryaqM tama#sO nirmuqmOca# | yEnEndrOq viSvAq aja#hAqdarA#tIqstEnAqhaM jyOti#ShAq jyOti#rAnaSAqna A$kShi || yat kusI#daqmapra#tIttaqM mayEqha yEna# yaqmasya# niqdhinAq carA#mi | Eqtattada#gnE anRuqNO Ba#vAmiq jIva#nnEqva pratiq tattE# dadhAmi || "yanmayi# mAqtA{17}" "yadA# piqpEShaq{18}" "yadaqntari#kShaqM{19}" " ~MyadAqSasA{20} "&ti#krAmAmi{21}" "triqtE dEqvA{22}" "diqvi jAqtA{23}" "yadApa#{24}" "iqmaM mE# varuNaq{25}" "tattvA# yAmiq{26}" "tvaM nO# agnEq{27}" "satvaM nO# agnEq{28}" "tvama#gnE aqyAsi#{29}"|| 3 (17)
anuvAkaM - 4

yadadI$vyannRuqNamaqhaM baqBUvAdi#th sanvA saMjaqgaraq janE$ByaH | aqgnirmAq tasmAqdindra#Sca sam~MvidAqnau pramu#~jcatAm || yaddhastA$ByAM caqkaraq kilbi#ShANyaqkShANA$M ~Mvaqgnumu#paqjiGna#mAnaH | uqgraqmpaqSyA ca# rAShTraqBRuccaq tAnya#PsaqrasAq vanu#dattA-mRuqNAni# || ugra#paMSyEq rAShTra#BRuqt kilbi#ShANiq yadaqkShavRu#ttaqmanu#dattamEqtat | nEnna# RuqNAnRuqNavaq ithsa#mAnO yaqmasya# lOqkE adhi# rajjuqrAya# || "ava# tEq hEDaq (hELaq) {30}" "udu#ttaqma{31}" "miqmaM mE# varuNaq{32}" "tattvA# yAmiq{33}" "tvaM nO# agnEq{34}" "satvaM nO# agnE{36} || saMku#sukOq viku#sukO nir.RuqthO yaSca# nisvaqnaH | tE&(1q)smad-yakShmaqmanA#gasO dUqrAd-dUqrama#cIcatam || nirya#kShmamacIcatE kRuqtyAM nir.Ru#tiM ca ( ) | tEnaq yO&(1q)smathsamRu#cCAtaiq tama#smaiq prasu#vAmasi || duqSSaq(gm)qsAqnuqSaq(gm)qsAByA$M GaqNEnA#nuGaqNEna# ca | tEnAqnyO&(1)qsmath samRu#cCAtaiq tama#smaiq prasu#vAmasi || sam~Mvarca#sAq paya#sAq santaqnUBiqraga#nmahiq mana#sAq sa(gm) SiqvEna# | tvaShTA# nOq atraq vida#dhAtu rAqyO&nu#mArShTu taqnvO(1q) yad-vili#ShTam || 4 (15) (kRuqtyAM nir.Ru#tiM caq pa~jca# ca (A4)
anuvAkaM - 5

a Ayu#ShTE viqSvatO# dadhadaqyamaqgnirvarE$NyaH | puna#stE prAqNa AyA#tiq parAq yakShma(gm)# suvAmi tE || AqyuqrdA a#gnE haqviShO# juShAqNO GRuqtapra#tIkO GRuqtayO#nirEdhi | GRuqtaM pIqtvA madhuq cAruq gavya#M piqtEva# puqtramaqBi ra#kShatAdiqmam || iqmama#gnaq Ayu#ShEq varca#sE kRudhi tiqgmamOjO# varuNaq sa(gm)Si#SAdhi | mAqtEvA$smA aditEq Sarma# yacCaq viSvE# dEvAq jara#daShTiqr yathA&sa#t || agnaq AyU(gm)#Shi pavasaq AsuqvOrjaqmiSha#M ca naH | AqrE bA#dhasva duqcCunA$m || agnEq pava#svaq svapA# aqsmE varca#H suqvIrya$m | dadha#d raqyiM mayiq pOSha$m || 5.1a (10)

b aqgnir. RuShiqH pava#mAnaqH pA~jca#janyaH puqrOhi#taH | tamI#mahE mahAgaqyam || agnE# jAqtAn praNu#dA naH saqpatnAqn pratyajA#tA~jjAtavEdO nudasva | aqsmE dI#dihi suqmanAq ahE#Daq~jCarma#ntE (ahE#Laq~jCarma#ntE) syAma triqvarU#tha uqdBau || saha#sA jAqtAn praNu#dA naH saqpatnAqn pratyajA#tA~jjAtavEdO nudasva | adhi# nO brUhi sumanaqsyamA#nO vaqya(gg) syA#maq praNu#dA naH saqpatnAn# || agnEq yO nOq&BitOq janOq vRukOq vArOq jiGA(gm)#sati | tA(gg)stvaM ~MvRu#traha~jjahiq vasvaqsmaByaqmA Ba#ra || agnEq yO nO#&BiqdAsa#ti samAqnO yaScaq niShTya#H | taM ~Mvaqya(gm) saqmidha#M kRuqtvA tuBya#maqgnE&pi#daddhmasi || 5.1b (10)

c yO naqH SapAqdaSa#patOq yaSca# naqH Sapa#taqH SapA$t | uqShAScaq tasmai# niqmrukcaq sarva#M pAqpa(gm) samU#hatAm || yO na#H saqpatnOq yO raNOq martO#&BiqdAsa#ti dEvAH | iqddhmasyE#va praqkShAya#tOq mA tasyOcCE#Shiq kiMcaqna || yO mAMdvEShTi# jAtavEdOq yaM cAqhaM dvEShmiq yaScaq mAm | sarvAq(gg)qstAna#gnEq sanda#haq yA(gg)ScAqhaM dvEShmiq yE caq mAm || yO aqsmaBya#marAtIqyAd-yaSca# nOq dvESha#tEq jana#H | nindAqdyO aqsmAn diPsA$ccaq sarvAq(gg)qstAnma#ShmaqShA ku#ru || sa(gm)Si#taM mEq brahmaq sa(gm)Si#taM ~MvIqryAm (1q) bala$m | sa(gm)Si#taM kShaqtraM mE# jiqShNu yasyAqhamasmi# puqrOhi#taH ( ) || udE#ShAM bAqhU a#tiraqmud-varcOq athOq bala$m | kShiqNOmiq brahma#NAq&mitrAqnunna#yAmiq svA~M(2) aqham || punaqrmanaqH punaqrAyu#rmaq AgAqt punaqScakShuqH punaqH SrOtra#M maq AgAqt puna#H prAqNaH punaqrAdhI#taM maq AgA$t | vaiqSvAqnaqrO mE&da#bdhastanUqpA ava#bAdhatAM duriqtAniq viSvA$ || 5.1c (14)
anuvAkaM - 6

a vaiqSvAqnaqrAyaq prati#vEdayAmOq yadI#nRuqNa(gm) sa#~ggaqrO dEqvatA#su | sa EqtAn pASA$n praqmucaqn pravE#daq sa nO# mu~jcAtu duriqtAdavaqdyAt || vaiqSvAqnaqraH pava#yAnnaH paqvitraiqryath sa#~ggaqra-maqBidhAvA$myAqSAm | anA#jAnaqn mana#sAq yAca#mAnOq yadatrainOq avaq tath su#vAmi || aqmI yE suqBagE# diqvi viqcRutauq nAmaq tAra#kE | prEhAmRuta#sya yacCatA-mEqtad-ba#ddhakaqmOca#nam || viji#hIrShva lOqkAn kRu#dhi baqndhAn mu#~jcAsiq baddha#kam | yOnE#rivaq pracyu#tOq garBaqH sarvA$n paqthO a#nuShva || sa pra#jAqnan prati#gRuBNIta viqdvAn praqjApa#tiH prathamaqjA Ruqtasya# | aqsmABi#rdaqttaM jaqrasa#H paqrastAqdacCi#nnaqM tantu#manuq saMca#rEma || 6.1a (10)
anuvAkaM - 7

vAta#raSanA haq vA RuSha#yaH SramaqNA Uqrddhvama#nthiqnO ba#BUvuqstA-nRuSha#yOq&rtha-mA#yaq(gg)qstE niqlAya#-macaraq(gg)qstE-&nu#praviSuH kUSmAqNDAniq tA(gg)-stEShvanva#vinda-~jCraqddhayA# caq tapa#sA caq , tAnRuSha#yO&bruvan kaqthA niqlAya#M caraqthEtiq ta RuShI#nabruvaqnnamO# vO&stu BagavantOq&smin dhA$mniq kEna# vaH saparyAqmEtiq tAnRuSha#yO&bruvan paqvitra#M nO brUtaq yEnA#rEqpasa#H syAqmEtiq ta EqtAni# sUqktAnya#paSyaqnq. , yad-dE#vA dEvaqhEDa#naqM (dEvaqhELa#naqM) ~MyadadI$vyannRuqNamaqhaM baqBUvAyu#ShTE viqSvatO# dadhaqdityEqtairAjya#M juhuta vaiSvAnaqrAyaq prati#vEdayAmaq ityupa#tiShThataq yada#rvAqcInaqmEnO$ BrUNahaqtyAyAqstasmA$n mOkShyaddhvaq itiq ,ta Eqtaira#juhavuqstE&rEqpasO#&Bavan karmAqdiShvEqtair-ju#huyAt pUqtO dE#valOqkAn thsama#SnutE || 7(1)
anuvAkaM - 8

kUqSmAqNDair ju#huyAqd-yO&pU#ta ivaq manyE#taq yathA$ stEqnO yathA$ BrUNaqhaivamEqSha Ba#vatiq yO&yOnauq rEta#H siq~jcatiq, yada#rvAqcInaqmEnO$ BrUNahaqtyAyAqstasmA$n mucyatEq yAvaqdEnO# dIqkShAmupai#ti dIkShiqta EqtaiH sa#taqti ju#hOti sam~MvathsaqraM dI$kShiqtO Ba#vati sam~MvathsaqrAdEqvAtmAna#M punItEq mAsa#M dIkShiqtO Ba#vatiq yO mAsaqH sa sam~MvathsaqraH sa#m~MvathsaqrAdEqvAtmAna#M punItEq catu#rvi(gm)Satiq(gm)q rAtrI$rdIkShiqtO Ba#vatiq catu#rvi(gm)Sati-rarddhamAqsAH sa#m~MvathsaqraH sa#m~MvathsaqrAdEqvAtmAna#M punItEq dvAda#Saq rAtrI$rdIkShiqtO Ba#vatiq dvAda#Saq mAsA$H sam~MvathsaqraH sa#m~MvathsaqrAdEqvAtmAna#M punItEq ShaDrAtrI$rdIkShiqtO Ba#vatiq ShaDvA Ruqtava#H sam~MvathsaqraH sa#m~MvathsaqrAdEqvAtmAna#M punItE tiqsrO rAtrI$r-dIkShiqtO Ba#vati triqpadA# gAyaqtrI gA#yatriqyA EqvAtmAna#M punItEq na mAq(gm)qsama#SnIyAqnna striyaqmupE#yAqnnOparyA#sItaq jugu#PsEqtAnRu#tAqtpayO$ brAhmaqNasya# vraqtaM ~Mya#vAqgU rA#jaqnya#syAqmikShAq vaiSyaqsyAthO# sauqmyE&pya#ddhvaqra EqtadvraqtaM brU#yAqd yadiq manyE#-tOpaqdasyAqmItyO#daqnaM dhAqnAH saktU$M GRuqtamityanu#vratayEdAqtmanO&nu#padAsAya || 8 (1)
anuvAkaM - 9

aqjAn. haq vai pRuSnI(gg)#stapaqsyamA#nAqn brahma# svayaqMBva#ByAna#r.Shaqtta RuSha#yO&Bavaqn tadRuShI#NA-mRuShiqtvaM tAM dEqvatAqmupA#tiShThanta yaqj~jakA#mAqsta EqtaM bra#hmayaqj~ja-ma#paSyaqn-tamA&ha#raqn-tEnA#yajantaq yadRuqcO&ddhyagI#Shataq tAH paya# AhutayO dEqvAnA#maBavaqnq. yad-yajU(gm)#Shi GRuqtAhu#tayOq yath sAmA#niq sOmA#hutayOq yadatha#rvA~ggiqrasOq maddhvA#hutayOq yadbrA$hmaqNAnI#tihAqsAn-pu#rAqNAniq kalpAqn gAthA# nArASaq(gm)qsIrmE#dAhuqtayO# dEqvAnA#-maBavaqntABiqH kShudha#M pAqpmAnaq-mapA$Gnaqn-napa#hatapApmAnO dEqvAH svaqrgaM ~MlOqkamA#yaqn brahma#NaqH sAyu#jyaq-mRuSha#yO&gacCann || 9 (1)
anuvAkaM - 10

pa~jcaq vA EqtE ma#hAyaqj~jAH sa#taqti pratA#yantE sataqti santi#ShThantE dEvayaqj~jaH pi#tRuyaqj~jO BU#tayaqj~jO ma#nuShyayaqj~jO bra#hmayaqj~ja itiq yadaqgnau juqhOtyaqpi saqmidhaqM tad-dE#vayaqj~jaH santi#ShThatEq yat piqtRuBya#H svaqdhA kaqrOtyapyaqpastat pi#tRuyaqj~jaH santi#ShThatEqyad-BUqtEByO# baqli(gm) hara#tiq tad-BU#tayaqj~jaH santi#ShThatEq yadbrA$hmaqNEByO&nnaqM dadA#tiq tanma#nuShyayaqj~jaH santi#ShThatEq yathsvA$ddhyAqya-madhI#yIq-taikA#mapyRuqcaM ~MyajuqH-sAma# vAq tadbra#hmayaqj~jaH santi#ShThatEq yadRuqcO&dhI#tEq paya#saqH kUlyA# asya piqtRUn thsvaqdhA aqBiva#hantiq yad-yajU(gm)#Shi GRuqtasya# kUlyAq yath sAmA#niq sOma# EByaH pavatEq yadatha#rvA~ggiqrasOq madhO$H kUlyAq yadbrA$hmaqNA-nI#tihAqsAn-pu#rAqNAniq kalpAqn gAthA# nArASaq(gm)qsIr-mEda#saqH kUlyA# asya piqtRUnth svaqdhA aqBiva#hantiq yadRuqcO&dhI#tEq paya# AhutiBirEqva tad-dEqvA(gg)sta#rpayatiq yad-yajU(gm)#Shi GRuqtAhu#tiBiqryath sAmA#niq sOmA#hutiBiqr-yadatha#rvA~ggiqrasOq maddhvA#hutiBiqr-yadbrA$hmaqNA-nI#tihAqsAn-pu#rAqNAniq kalpAqn gAthA# nArASaq(gm)qsIr-mE#dAhuqtiBi#rEqva tad-dEqvA(gg)sta#rpayatiq ta E#nan tRuqptA Ayu#ShAq tEja#sAq varca#sA SriqyA yaSa#sA brahmavarcaqsEnAqnnAdyE#na ca tarpayanti || 10 (1)
anuvAkaM - 11

braqhmaqyaqj~jEna# yaqkShyamA#NaqH prAcyA$M diqSi grAmAqdaCa#dirdaqrq.Sa udI$cyAM prAgudIqcyAM ~MvOqdita# AdiqtyE da#kShiNaqta u#paqvIyO#paqviSyaq hastA#vavaqnijyaq trirAcA#mEqddviH pa#riqmRujya# saqkRudu#paqspRuSyaq SiraqScakShu#ShIq nAsi#kEq SrOtrEq hRuda#yamAqlaByaq yat trirAqcAma#tiq tEnaq Ruca#H prINAtiq yaddviH pa#riqmRuja#tiq tEna yajU(gm)#Shiq yath saqkRudu#paqspRuSa#tiq tEnaq sAmA#niq (yath saqvyaM pAqNi pAqdau prOqkShatiq) yacCiraqScakShu#ShIq nAsi#kEq SrOtrEq hRuda#yamAqlaBa#tEq tEnAtha#rvA~ggiqrasO$ brAhmaqNA-nI#tihAqsAn pu#rAqNAniq kalpAqn gAthA# nArASaq(gm)qsIH prI#NAtiq darBA#NAM maqhadu#paqstIryOqpastha#M kRuqtvA prA~gAsI#naH svAddhyAqyamadhI#yItAqpAM ~MvA EqSha OSha#dhInAq(gm)q rasOq yad-daqrBAH sara#sameqva brahma# kurutE dakShiNOttaqrau pAqNI (pAqdau) kRuqtvA sapaqvitrAqvOmitiq prati#padyata Eqtadvai yaju#strayIM ~MviqdyAM pratyEqShA vAgEqtatpa#raqmamaqkSharaqM tadEqtadRuqcA&Byu#ktamRuqcO aqkSharE# paraqmE vyO#maqnq. yasmi#n dEqvA adhiq viSvE# niShEqduryastanna vEdaq kimRuqcA ka#riShyatiq ya ittadviqdusta iqmE samA#sataq itiq trInEqva prAyu#~gktaq BUrBuvaqHsva#rityA#haiqtadvai vAqcaH saqtyaM ~MyadEqva vAqcaH saqtyaM tat prAyuq~gktAtha# sAviqtrIM gA#yaqtrIM triranvA#ha paqcCO$&rddharca#SO&navAqna(gm) sa#viqtA Sriya#H prasaviqtA Sriya#mEqvApnOqt yathO$ praqj~jAta#yaiqva pra#tiqpadAq CandA(gm)#siq prati#padyatE || 11 (1)
anuvAkaM - 12

grAmEq mana#sA svAddhyAqyamadhI#yItaq divAq nakta#M ~MvEqti ha# smAqha Sauqca A$hnEqya uqtAra#NyEq&bala# uqta vAqcOta tiShTha#nnuqta vraja#nnuqtAsI#na uqta SayA#nOq&dhIyI#taiqva svA$ddhyAqyaM tapa#svIq puNyO# Bavatiq ya EqvaM ~MviqdvAnth svA$ddhyAqyamadhI#tEq namOq brahma#NEq namO# astvaqgnayEq nama#H pRuthiqvyai namaq OSha#dhIByaH | namO# vAqcE namO# vAqcaspata#yEq namOq viShNa#vE bRuhaqtE ka#rOmi || 12 (2)
anuvAkaM - 13

maqddhyandi#nE praqbalaqmadhI#yItAqsau Kaluq vAvaiSha A#diqtyO yadbrA$hmaqNastasmAqttar.hiq tEkShNi#ShThaM tapatiq tadEqShA&Byu#ktA || ciqtraM dEqvAnAqmuda#gAqdanI#kaqM cakShu#rmiqtrasyaq varu#NasyAqgnEH | A&prAq dyAvA#pRuthiqvI aqntari#kShaq(gm)q sUrya# AqtmA jaga#tastaqsthuShaqScEtiq sa vA EqSha yaqj~jaH saqdyaH pratA#yatE saqdyaH santi#ShThatEq tasyaq prAKsAqyama#vaBRuqthO namOq brahma#Naq iti# paridhAqnIyAqM triranvA#hAqpa u#paqspRuSya# gRuqhAnE#tiq tatOq yatkiMcaq dadA#tiq sA dakShi#NA || 13 (3)
anuvAkaM - 14

tasyaq vA Eqtasya# yaqj~jasyaq mEGO# haviqrddhAna#M ~Mviqdyudaqgnirvaqr.qSha(gm) haqviH sta#nayiqtnur-va#ShaTkAqrO yada#vaqsPUrja#tiq sO&nu#vaShaTkAqrO vAqyurAqtmA&mA#vAqsyA$ sviShTaqkRudya EqvaM ~MviqdvAnmEqGE vaqr.qShati# viqdyOta#mAnE staqnaya#tyavaqsPUrja#tiq pava#mAnE vAqyAva#mAvAqsyA#yA(gg) svAddhyAqyamadhI#tEq tapa# Eqva tatta#pyatEq tapO# hi svAddhyAqya ityu#ttaqmaM nAka(gm)# rOhatyuttaqmaH sa#mAqnAnA$M Bavatiq yAva#nta(gm) haq vA iqmAM ~Mviqttasya# pUqrNAM dada#thsvaqrgaM ~MlOqkaM ja#yatiq tAva#ntaM ~MlOqkaM ja#yatiq BUyA(gm)#saM cAkShaqyyaM cApa# punarmRuqtyuM ja#yatiq brahma#NaqH sAyu#jyaM gacCati || 14 (1)
anuvAkaM - 15

The same reason is appilicable for non availabity of Anuvaaka Korvai in some of the above Anuvaakams. First and Last Padam in TA, 2nd Prapaatakam :- (saha# vai - muni#ByaScaq namaH ) || hari#H Om || || kRuShNa yajurvEdIya taittirIya brAhmaNE AraNyakE dvitIyaH prapAThakaH samAptaH || Appendix (of Expansions)
